answers.author: Caitlyn Mitchell
answers.text:
Here is an example of a city and county that both claim to have adopted their strategic plans:
Colorado Springs City:
http://www.springsgov.com/units/budget/2011/AppendixCStratPlan.pdf
Peroria County, IL
http://www.peoriacounty.org/download/?path=/finance/Budget%20and%20Financial%20Information/2011_Budget/2011-Peoria%20County%20Recommended%20Budget.pdf
Hope it helps!

author: Ellen Whelan-Wuest
text:
Hello,
I work for Durham County in North Carolina, and we have just begun the process of creating a strategic plan fo rthe county.  I have researched and found several examples of other counties that have gone through this process and their strategic plans, but I'm wondering if anyone can point me to those municipal or county governments that actually adopted the plans into the budget, thereby implementing it?
Thank you,
Ellen Whelan-Wuest
ewwuest@durhamcountync.gov
Durham County, NC
title: Examples of Strategic Plans Adopted into County or City Budget?
